messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
I’m warmed up and limber.
I’m OK to battle!
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT:
...Oh, serious woe.
I wasn’t prepared emotionally for this.
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
I wish I could just run from all this...
Just joking.
messages.TRMSG_NOT_MORNING_UNUSED:
I’m going to keep running.
Just as long as there’s a road...
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
I’ve been training so I can have
a rematch with you.I’m OK to battle!
